name: Motor Freestyle Racing
description:
Motor Freestyle Racing is a new era in motorbike stunt racing games adventure. Have you ever dreamed of performing motor bike master in bike death racing games designed for daring highway riders on bizarre offroad? Hurl yourself into the world of dirt biking adventure! This freestyle bikes jumping stunts and addictive game.
Features
- Epic bike crashes, fun rag doll physics and active bike suspension.
- Eye popping high definition graphics.
- Tricks, bunny hops and flips and do stick stunts!
- Crazy addictive game-play with ultra smooth tilt controls.
